nodes.text: Nebellia was a virus that could cause respiratory tract problems and diarrhea.

In 19 BBY, Mandalorian Mij Gilamar gave Doctor Ovolot Qail Uthan a few samples of nebellia virus. Uthan used the virus in her work to develop an antigen for the FG36, a deadly virus she created that was being used by Emperor Palpatine.
